physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Patient is alert and oriented x3, resting comfortably in bed. Abdomen is soft, non-tender and non-distended (NT/ND). No edema in extremities.
Abdomen soft, tender to palpation in the lower abdomen, right of midline and midline into suprapubic area.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Initially soft and non-tender, then developed tenderness upon palpation in the lower abdomen.
